channel.title: I get an error when someone tries to log in [Server Sided]
channel.description:
Ok so I have all of my settings correct. I just recently figured out a problem with my port forwarding and now I get a server sided error when i attempt to log in from my other computer. I an using this client and source=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432858.0.html This is the Error- [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm192/mikeiskool69/erroronlogin.png[/img]
Anyone wanna try to log on?? http://uppit.com/252mrczr82ds/420_scape.zip

item.title: I get an error when someone tries to log in [Server Sided]
item.dc:creator: @Four2c0dez Four2c0dez
item.description:
@Four2c0dez wrote:

do you know what i should search to change that? Im using a new source now im using The real project from the server downloads section. I opened client.java changed the ips and still cant log in via my computer that is not hosting. Looking for the solution for almost a week now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Four2c0dez:

i downloaded a cleaned client and source… u think think the files are corrupted? i fiddled around with some things and now i get this message i think im a step closer.

you probably messed up on shops, npcs, or items. Find out what was the last thing you coded before this happened.

item.title: I get an error when someone tries to log in [Server Sided]
item.dc:creator: @Four2c0dez Four2c0dez
item.description:
@Four2c0dez wrote:

i changed an ip in the client to “fourtwentyscape.no-ip.biz” in 2 spots in client.java, now i realized that i had no-ip open on my other computer and now my server doesnt even recognize me attempting to log in on my other comp. Is my problem that i havent changed the ip in enough places? and if so can you take a look and tell me where

Read full topic
